resources.string: The Parked Here app requires ARCore which isn\'t supported by your device.
Error initializing ARCore. Kindly restart the app and try again.
Point your camera at buildings, stores, and signs near you.
Error identifying your surroundings. Kindly restart the app and try again.
TAP ON SCREEN TO CREATE ANCHOR
Your current location does not have VPS coverage. Your session will be using your GPS signal only if VPS is not available.
To power this session, Google will process visual data from your camera.
Too many terrain anchors have already been held. Clear all anchors to create new ones.
Still resolving the terrain anchor. Please make sure you\'re in an area that has VPS coverage.
The precise location permission is required to accurately show your parking location on the map.
The camera permission is required to show your parking location in Augmented Reality (AR).
To power this session, visual data from your camera will be processed by Google.
Your current location does not have VPS coverage. Your session will be using your GPS signal instead.
Learn how to mark your Parking Spot here
Point your phone towards buildings, roads, signs, etc.
It’ll take a few seconds for the app to identify your surroundings.
Once you start seeing a plane (White Mesh Grid) being rendered on your device screen, you can then place a marker right above your parked car.
The app will remember the precise location where your car was parked.
When you want to find your parked car, the map view will help you navigate closer to your marker.
When you get closer to your marker, you can use the real-time view from your camera to find your marker above your car in Augmented Reality (AR).
When you want to add a new parking marker, you can use the reset button on the top-right corner to remove the current marker.
Are you sure you want to reset your parking spot on the map? This will remove your current parking marker.
